mailOnError.description: possible values: yes, no, 1, 0, true, false

mailOnWarning.description: possible values: yes, no, 1, 0, true, false

mailOnSuccess.description: possible values: yes, no, 1, 0, true, false

mailOnProcess.description: possible values: yes, no, true, false, non-negative integer

mailOnDelayAfterError.description: possible values: all, first_only, last_only, first_and_last_only

logLevel.description: possible values: error, warn, info, debug, debug[1-9]

history.description: possible values: yes, no, 1, 0, true, false

historyOnProcess.description: possible values: yes, no, true, false, non-negative integer
